title.bowTiePasta: Bow Tie Pasta with Chicken Balls

description.burger: Grilled beef topped with rich cheese and savory touches for a truly royal burger experience.
description.bowTiePasta: Al dente bow-tie pasta served with tender chicken balls in a creamy, flavorful sauce.
description.royale: Juicy grilled beef patty seasoned with special spices, cooked to perfection and served fresh for a rich, smoky flavor.
description.fettuccineCheese: Fettuccine pasta smothered with shredded cheese and garnished with fresh tomato slices.
description.meatMushroomPizza: A hearty pizza loaded with mixed meats, mushrooms, and gooey melted cheese.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.message: The flavors here are incredible! Every dish tells a story of passion and quality. Highly recommend!

mike.name: Mike Chen
mike.message: Best dining experience I've had in years. The staff is friendly and the atmosphere is perfect.

about-page.title: About Us
about-page.text: Get to know more about Tayba

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Discover Our Story
history.p1: Tayba’s journey began with a genuine passion for delivering a unique dining experience that combines high quality with authentic flavors. From the very beginning, our goal has been to craft dishes with care, using carefully selected ingredients to meet and exceed our customers’ expectations.
history.p2: Over the years, we have remained committed to continuous growth and innovation, refining our recipes while staying true to our core values of quality, cleanliness, and attention to detail to ensure a memorable experience with every visit.

who.title: Who We Are
who.subtitle: Welcome to Tayba
who.p1: Tayba is a brand dedicated to offering a complete dining experience, built on the belief that food is more than just a meal—it is a moment to be enjoyed through great taste, attentive service, and a welcoming atmosphere.
who.p2: We strive to be our customers’ first choice by upholding the highest quality standards, providing a diverse menu that appeals to all tastes, and building long-lasting relationships based on trust and satisfaction.

chefs.title: Meet Our Chefs
chefs.text: Passionate chefs crafting flavorful dishes with skill, creativity, and love

smokeyBBQChickenPizza.title: Smokey BBQ Chicken Pizza
smokeyBBQChickenPizza.desc: Tender BBQ chicken, smoked mozzarella, red onions, and fresh basil.

fourCheeseRicottaPizza.title: Four Cheese Ricotta Pizza
fourCheeseRicottaPizza.desc: Ricotta, mozzarella, parmesan, and provolone on a crispy base.

classicMargherita.title: Classic Margherita
classicMargherita.desc: Fresh tomatoes, buffalo mozzarella, basil, and olive oil drizzle.

pepperoniLoversPizza.title: Pepperoni Lovers Pizza
pepperoniLoversPizza.desc: Loaded with premium pepperoni, mozzarella, and our signature sauce.

veggieGardenDelight.title: Veggie Garden Delight
veggieGardenDelight.desc: Bell peppers, mushrooms, olives, red onions, and basil pesto.

spaghettiBolognese.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
spaghettiBolognese.desc: Slow-cooked beef ragù with parmesan and fresh herbs.

chickenAlfredo.title: Creamy Chicken Alfredo
chickenAlfredo.desc: Grilled chicken with creamy Alfredo sauce and fettuccine pasta.

penneArrabbiata.title: Penne Arrabbiata
penneArrabbiata.desc: Penne tossed in a spicy tomato-garlic sauce with chili flakes.

doubleBeefBurger.title: Double Beef Smash Burger
doubleBeefBurger.desc: Two smashed beef patties with cheddar, pickles, and house sauce.

crispyChickenBurger.title: Crispy Chicken Burger
crispyChickenBurger.desc: Crispy chicken fillet, lettuce, mayo, and brioche bun.

bbqBaconBurger.title: BBQ Bacon Burger
bbqBaconBurger.desc: Grilled beef, smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, and cheddar.

spicyJalapenoBurger.title: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
spicyJalapenoBurger.desc: Jalapeños, spicy sauce, melted cheese, and caramelized onions.

lavaCake.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
lavaCake.desc: Warm molten chocolate cake served with vanilla ice cream.

cheesecake.title: New York Cheesecake
cheesecake.desc: Classic creamy cheesecake topped with fresh berry sauce.

tiramisu.title: Tiramisu
tiramisu.desc: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone cream.
